ygData.subject: Trade
ygData.msgSnippet: i went out and got all the lambent armor when the quests first began.  it was a lot of fun for me, and i had not gotten the rest of my imbrued at the time.
ygData.messageBody:
i went out and got all the lambent armor when the quests first began. it
was a lot of fun for me, and i had not gotten the rest of my imbrued at the
time. pretty much the day after i got all the lambent items, i did complete
my imbrued set, and the lambent has pretty much been in the bank since.
well there are a couple of items i want for my wizard: smr and runed cowl.
now even a full set of lambent is not worth an smr, i would probably throw
in a ykehsa, molten cloak, and cash (that's all i got in the bank other than
the lambent and my old set of rubicite). but, someone did want a full set
of lambent, and i said well how about a runed cowl. he had to think about
it, and so did i. the deal did not go through, as he did not have a cowl
but was thinking of spending the 10000pp or so it would cost him to get one,
to save him from getting all the lambent armor. took me 3 days, but that is
obviously above average. so what do you think of the full lambent set for a
runed cowl trade? my guild was split on the subject, as i was.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server
